requirements.summary: Update the frontend admin authentication hook to validate credentials against the backend instead of using hardcoded frontend values
acceptanceCriteria: Admin login form calls backend authentication endpoint
Frontend receives and stores authentication token or session
Login succeeds only when backend validates credentials

file_operations.description: Replace hardcoded credential validation with a backend call. Remove the hardcoded username/password check and instead call a backend authentication capability that validates credentials against the backend's stored admin user. Update the login function to await the backend response and handle authentication success/failure. Store authentication status in localStorage upon successful backend validation. Maintain the existing context structure and loading states.

Update error handling to display backend authentication errors appropriately. Ensure the form submission awaits the backend authentication call from useAdminAuth and shows relevant error messages when credentials are invalid or backend calls fail. Maintain existing form validation and redirect logic on successful authentication.
